email_content:
Hi Emily,

I wanted to share a brief update on how the revised curriculum has been performing this semester.

Key observations so far:
• Overall student performance has risen noticeably, with aggregate grades showing a double-digit improvement compared with the previous term.
• Students consistently highlight the hands-on, real-world components as particularly helpful for grasping core concepts.
• The most common request is for additional guidance and resources in the more advanced modules. A few learners also mentioned that extra review sessions prior to major assessments would be beneficial.

What this means:
– The practical, project-based elements appear to be a clear strength worth preserving.
– We may want to consider adding optional tutoring hours, peer-led study groups, or supplemental materials to support the transition into higher-level content.

Next steps:
1. I will prepare a concise summary report with aggregated data trends (no individual information) for our joint reference.
2. Let’s schedule a brief call next week to discuss potential support strategies and any insights you’re seeing on your end.

Please let me know if you have questions or would like the preliminary summary sooner.

Best regards,
John
